de.amr.plt.rcTestapp

Class MapActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • de.amr.plt.rcTestapp.MapActivity

  • public class MapActivity
extends Activity
    The MapActivity is the main crossroad for the entire NXT Remote-control. This class links all functionality together.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniel Wohllebe
